div.font:
2. import context
3. put a reference to data inside context via "value" on <MyContext.Provider value={}>
4. <Home/> can now use this data

div.div:
reducer = (state, action) =>{} 'action' is passed in reducer, it is the object dispatched eg. dispatch({type: , payload:})
state and dispatch given by default from useReducer()
reducer always returns - a new value representing the state

switch.text: reducer = (state, action) =>{} 'action' is passed in reducer, it is the object dis...
